name: Python
details: Python is the first language I really took the time to learn when I started in 2020.
It started with the Python Institute Certified Entry-Level Python Programer certification and continued with a Python Programming course
for my MSc. in Computer Science.
I have been writing in Python almost every day since then, and continue to do so at my current job.
I have built several projects with Python, typically also with the Django web framework.

name: Redux
details: With respect to Redux with React, I became familiar with the technology through a Udemy course.
Additionally, I work with Redux on projects in a professional setting.

name: Cypress
details: Not yet used Cypress on a personal project but have set it up in work environemnt.
The team implemented Cypress Page Object Model to create smoke tests for all pages on internal platform.
